short_summary: Request for Standing Offer for Bread and Bakery Products
description: The government is seeking offers to provide geographically zone based Regional Master Standing Offers (RMSO) for the supply and delivery of Bread and Bakery Products, known as Offres à Commandes Régionales (OCPR).
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Request for Standing Offer
## Request for Standing Offer for Bread and Bakery Products
### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4274179126-Doc4274251863
* **Amendment Number:** 3
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4274179126
* **Publication Date:** 2023-10-25
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-11-30T14:00:00 (EST)
* **Amendment Date:** 2023-11-27
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-01-01
* **Tender Status:** Expiration

### Procurement Details

* **UNSPSC**: 50180000 - Bread and bakery products
* **Procurement Category:** Goods
* **Method of Procurement:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest price

### Contract Details

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Regions of Delivery:** Ontario (except NCR), National Capital Region (NCR)
* **End User Entities:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Contact Information

* **Contact Person:** Liao, Guo (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** guo.liao@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and others

### Tender Description

Canada is seeking offers to provide regional master standing offers (RMSO) for the supply and delivery of Bread and Bakery Products on an as-and-when-requested basis. The provincial region of Ontario has been divided into six zones. Bidders can submit pricing for as many or as few line items as they wish for each zone.

If you have any questions or need further clarification, kindly reach out to the contact person directly.

---

Note: Trades agreements listed in the original document have been abbreviated for brevity; please refer to the original document for the complete listing. 
Regions of delivery could have geographic restrictions, referring to the provinces listing above.

Key items to highlight for stakeholders:

* Tender closing date: 2023-11-30 14:00 EST
* Unusual bid submission deadline clarification
* Requests for standing offer
* Bakers and breading products included
* Provincial distribution
